sentence.text: Police are probing allegations that Sage , 16 , hatched a bizarre plan to kill his dad 's handyman .
SCOTLAND Yard is probing ballot rigging allegations in the seamen 's union -- revealed in the Daily Mirror last year .
AN escaped prisoner known as The Crusher was being hunted last night by police probing a nightwatchman 's murder .
SCOTLAND Yard is to probe allegations that British paras executed Argentine prisoners during the Falklands conflict .
A MINICAB driver and a woman were arrested yesterday by police probing a rape and kidnap .

Detectives are probing a break-in at the Smith Arms in Greatham , near Hartlepool .

BERN , Switzerland ( AP ) --- Switzerland 's prosecutor 's office on Wednesday approved releasing bank and corporate documents to Italian anti-corruption investigators probing former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi .

SINGAPORE --- Singapore investigators probing the collapse of Barings PLC have completed their investigation , which took them to London and Tokyo , and a full report is expected in June , a newspaper reported Wednesday .

Investigators will start from scratch in probing the murders of Roman Catholic Cardinal Juan Jesus Posadas Ocampo , presidential candidate Luis Donaldo Colosio and leading politician Jose Francisco Ruiz Massieu , prosecutor Pablo Chapa Manzanilla told legislators .
Ed_Henry : Democratic leader Harry Reed accused Republicans of failing to probe allegations the White House manipulated intelligence to justify the war in Iraq .
